title: User Login Success
description: Verify that users can log in successfully with valid credentials and are redirected to the dashboard within 2 seconds.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Verify successful login and redirect to dashboard within 2 seconds

title: User Login Failure With Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and error messages display when invalid credentials are used.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email and/or password
Click the login button
Verify login failure with appropriate error message displayed

title: Password Recovery Process
description: Validate the password recovery process, including form submission, email receipt, and reset password functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page
Submit registered email for password reset
Confirm receipt of password recovery email
Follow link in email and set a new password
Verify successful password reset and login with new password

title: Student CRUD Operations
description: Verify full Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on student profiles including attachments.

steps.description: Navigate to the student management page
Create a new student with all required fields filled
Verify student appears in the student list
Edit the created studentâ€™s data and add attachments
Confirm updated details and attachments are saved correctly
Delete the student profile
Verify student is removed from the list and all associated attachments are deleted

title: Training Directive Creation and Versioning
description: Verify the ability to create training directives, edit, version, publish, and set defaults with input validation.

steps.description: Navigate to the Training Directives module
Create a new directive with valid inputs including rules and parameters
Verify directive is saved and appears in directive catalog
Edit the directive and save as a new version
Confirm version history and default directive setting function correctly
Publish the directive
Verify the directive is active and applied in automated decision engine

title: Rule Creation and Validation in Decision Engine
description: Validate creating rules with tag-based conditions, operator selection, and priority settings with no errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the rule creation interface in Training Directives
Add multiple conditions using various operators and tags
Verify input validation accepts valid rules and rejects invalid formats
Set priority and output parameters
Confirm rules are saved and correctly prioritized in decision engine

title: Catalog Rendering and Validation
description: Verify all catalogs including RIR scale, protocols with LaTeX formulas, readiness scales, and tags render correctly with validation for inputs.

steps.description: Access various directives and catalog views (RIR, protocols, readiness scales)
Verify visual rendering of LaTeX formulas and tag search functionality
Attempt invalid input in catalog forms
Confirm proper validation errors are shown

title: Relationship Thread Lifecycle
description: Test creating, editing, and closing relationship threads per student/service with event logging of notes, tasks, templates, and reminders.

steps.description: Navigate to relationship module and create a new thread linked to a student and optionally a service
Add various event types including notes, create tasks, apply templates with live preview, and set reminders
Verify all events are logged correctly and displayed in thread timeline
Close a task and mark as completed
Confirm status update reflects in thread and kanban board

title: Kanban Workflow and WIP Limits Enforcement
description: Verify kanban board supports task drag-and-drop, enforces Work-In-Progress limits, dynamic badge updates, and reflects onboarding progress.

steps.description: Open the kanban board in relationship module
Drag and drop tasks between columns
Verify tasks move correctly and workflows update
Attempt to exceed WIP limits in a column
Confirm system prevents exceeding limits with visible warnings
Check dynamic badges update to reflect current task counts

title: Reminder Engine Setup and Notification Trigger
description: Validate configuration of reminder rules, simulation of execution generating events, and triggering of internal toast notifications without external messaging.

steps.description: Navigate to reminder engine configuration
Create reminder rules with valid parameters and conditions
Verify rules are saved successfully
Simulate reminder execution to trigger notifications
Confirm toast notifications appear with counters and no external messaging is sent

title: Accessibility and Keyboard Navigation
description: Verify all interactive UI elements have data-testid attributes, proper ARIA roles, support keyboard navigation, and maintain correct focus order with visible focus states.

steps.description: Navigate through all core UI modules using keyboard only
Verify visible focus outlines and appropriate ARIA roles for elements
Confirm all interactive elements have valid data-testid attributes

title: Performance Validation Under Load
description: Ensure core interactions including login, navigation, and CRUD operations complete within 400ms at the 95th percentile as per query timing logs.

steps.description: Execute key workflows multiple times under simulated load
Analyze performance logs to verify P95 response times below 400ms

title: Audit Logs Verification
description: Confirm that all create, update, delete, and state change actions are consistently recorded in audit logs with accurate details.

steps.description: Perform create, update, delete, and state change operations on students, training directives, and relationship events
Verify audit logs contain accurate and complete records of these actions

title: Role-Based Access and Row-Level Security Enforcement
description: Validate that users can access modules and data strictly according to their roles and organization boundaries enforced by PostgreSQL RLS policies.

steps.description: Log in with users having different roles and permissions
Attempt to access data and modules outside allowed scope
Verify access is denied and no unauthorized data is exposed
Check RLS policies prevent bypass

title: Premium UI/UX Experience Validation
description: Confirm responsive layouts with no unwanted scrolling, consistent styling, immediate feedback with loaders and toast notifications across devices and screen sizes.

steps.description: Access the application on desktop and mobile viewports
Verify no unnecessary scrollbars appear and all content fits screen appropriately
Confirm visual consistency of buttons, modals, tag selects, loaders, and toast messages
Trigger actions that cause loading states and toast notifications
Verify immediate visual feedback is shown without delay

title: Automated End-to-End Test Suite Run
description: Validate that automated test suites (TestSprite, Puppeteer, Jest, Vitest) run successfully with 100% pass rates across modules.

steps.description: Execute full automated test suites
Verify 100% pass rate with no failures

title: Kanban Drag-and-Drop Edge Cases
description: Test Kanban drag-and-drop with rapid and bulk movements including invalid drops to ensure stability and correct behavior.

steps.description: Perform rapid drag-and-drop of multiple tasks between columns
Attempt to drop tasks outside valid columns
Verify no UI crashes, data corruption or WIP violations

title: Relationship Message Template Application and Preview
description: Check applying message templates in relationship threads shows live preview and commits content properly.

steps.description: Select a message template in a relationship thread
Verify live preview renders template content correctly
Commit the message to the thread
Confirm message is added to the thread and persists after refresh
